name: OUIJA (Fear-games)
description:
Built for SpoopyJam 3 over 3 days https://itch.io/jam/spoopy-jam-3-spoopy-as-heck

Ouija is a prototype game that uses your microphone to allow you to communicate with a ghost to work out the identity of their killer.

If i were to expand this project I would like to add more narrative elements with deeper story telling and more possible keywords

The keyword recognition can be somewhat fickle so if it is not picking up words from your sentence try just using the keyword itself
